tool_description: Domain Reputation API lets you build a risk profile for a given domain or IP address with a single score based on multiple data sources.
name: Domain Reputation
title: Domain Reputation

api_list.name: Domain Reputation
api_list.description: Evaluate reputation of a domain or IP (v1)

optional_parameters.name: outputFormat
optional_parameters.description: Response output format. Acceptable values: XML or JSON. Defaults to JSON.

optional_parameters.name: mode
optional_parameters.description: API can check your domain in 2 modes: 'fast' - some heavy tests and data collectors will be disabled. 'full' - all the data and the tests will be processed. Default: fast
